name: Dot Worlds
description:
Are you smarter than a 5th grader? Dot World was developed by a 5th grader and funded through Kickstarter. Do you have what it takes to conquer his levels? Doubtful...

Dot lives in a simple world but he likes it. However, one day Dot's World is invaded by an army of evil shapes that take his friend Green and make clones of Dot; Duodot, XDot, and LeaDot! Luckily, the clones aren't evil as planned! Dot, Duodot, Leadot, and XDot must go through maze after maze to save Green!

*NEW* Do you have the skills it takes to survive TIME ATTACK MODE? You have ten seconds to complete the first stage, and when you complete the stage it adds ten seconds to your time, and that's how much time you have for the next level!

Villains as of version 2.6:
Grey walls
Laser walls
Die-monds
10 sec. Time Bombs
Tri3s
Mondo the disappearing walls
Rumble Earth
Moving walls
Teleportals

Note:
If you die within the first .5 seconds you will not respawn. This can be fixed by hitting the light blue "r" button in the upper right-hand corner.
Also, your game progress is saved every 10 levels! So make sure you keep playing until you reach a save point so you won't lose any progress.

Happy tilting!






Now where did I leave those portals...
